languages.text: "Даруй же слова благословения, Домин'{name}. И да будет свершен ритуал сплетения". {n}Лик Кибеллы расплывается перед глазами. Как бы вы ни старались сосредоточиться и развеять видение, вместо лица культистки на вас смотрит маска смерти — расколотый череп с пустыми глазницами.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Даруй же слова благословения, Домин'{name}. И да будет свершен ритуал сплетения". {n}Лик Кибеллы расплывается перед глазами. Как бы вы ни старались сосредоточиться и развеять видение, вместо лица культистки на вас смотрит маска смерти — расколотый череп с пустыми глазницами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Enim'{name}. And may Tue'ri commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, instead of the cultist's face you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Enim'{name}. And may Tue'ri commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, instead of the cultist's face you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Enim'{name}, and may Tue'ri commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of the cultist's face you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Enim'{name}, and may Tue'ri commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of the cultist's face you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

"Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

languages.text: "Salbt mich mit Eurem Segen, Domin'{name}, und möge die Zeremonie der Verschlingung beginnen." {n}Kibellahs Gesicht verschwimmt vor deinen Augen. So sehr du auch versuchst, dich zu konzentrieren und die Vision abzuschütteln, du siehst eine Todesmaske, einen geborstenen Schädel mit leeren Augenhöhlen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Salbt mich mit Eurem Segen, Domin'{name}, und möge die Zeremonie der Verschlingung beginnen." {n}Kibellahs Gesicht verschwimmt vor deinen Augen. So sehr du auch versuchst, dich zu konzentrieren und die Vision abzuschütteln, du siehst eine Todesmaske, einen geborstenen Schädel mit leeren Augenhöhlen.{/n}

languages.text: «Únjame con su bendición, Domin'{name}, y que comience la ceremonia de entrelazamiento». {n}El rostro de Kibellah se vuelve borroso. Por más que intentas concentrarte y enfocar la mirada, en lugar de su rostro ves una máscara de muerte: una calavera rota con las cuencas de los ojos vacías.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Únjame con su bendición, Domin'{name}, y que comience la ceremonia de entrelazamiento». {n}El rostro de Kibellah se vuelve borroso. Por más que intentas concentrarte y enfocar la mirada, en lugar de su rostro ves una máscara de muerte: una calavera rota con las cuencas de los ojos vacías.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの祝福を私に注いで欲しいの、ドミン・{name}。そして結びつけの儀式を始めよう」{n}目の前のキベラの顔がぼやける。どんなに焦点を合わせ、ヴィジョンを消そうとしても、彼女の顔がある場所にデスマスクが見える。眼球はなく、割れた頭蓋骨の姿だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの祝福を私に注いで欲しいの、ドミン・{name}。そして結びつけの儀式を始めよう」{n}目の前のキベラの顔がぼやける。どんなに焦点を合わせ、ヴィジョンを消そうとしても、彼女の顔がある場所にデスマスクが見える。眼球はなく、割れた頭蓋骨の姿だ。{/n}

languages.text: “请赐予我你的祝福，秘者{name}，让盘绕祭礼开始吧。”{n}绮贝菈的面孔开始变得模糊。哪怕你再怎么集中注意力，试图驱散幻象，在你眼中，她的脸都变成了象征死亡的面具，带着破碎的头骨与空洞的眼窝。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请赐予我你的祝福，秘者{name}，让盘绕祭礼开始吧。”{n}绮贝菈的面孔开始变得模糊。哪怕你再怎么集中注意力，试图驱散幻象，在你眼中，她的脸都变成了象征死亡的面具，带着破碎的头骨与空洞的眼窝。{/n}

languages.text: « Accordez-moi l'onction de votre bénédiction, Domin'{name}, et que la cérémonie de jumelage commence. »{n}Le visage de Kibellah se brouille pour être remplacé par un masque de mort fait d'un crâne brisé aux orbites creuses, malgré tous vos efforts de concentration pour dissiper cette vision.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Accordez-moi l'onction de votre bénédiction, Domin'{name}, et que la cérémonie de jumelage commence. »{n}Le visage de Kibellah se brouille pour être remplacé par un masque de mort fait d'un crâne brisé aux orbites creuses, malgré tous vos efforts de concentration pour dissiper cette vision.{/n}

languages.text: "Lütfunla beni kutsa Domin'{name}. Büküm töreni başlasın." {n}Kibellah'nın yüzü, gözlerinin önünde bulanıklaşıyor. Odaklanıp görüntüyü zihninden savmak için ne kadar çabalasan da Kibellah'nın yüzünün yerinde boş göz çukurları ile kırık bir kafatasından yapılmış bir ölüm maskesi görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Anoint me with your blessing, Domin'{name}, and may the ceremony of twining commence." {n}Kibellah's face blurs before your eyes. No matter how hard you try to focus and dispel the vision, in place of her face, you see a death mask, a broken skull with hollow eye sockets.{/n}
